snippet: Kansas City hired George Brett as interim hitting coach in the team’s latest effort to revive a franchise that has not been to the postseason since Brett helped win a title in 1985.
abstract: Tyler Kepner Extra Basess column holds that Kansas City Royals hired George Brett as interim hitting coach in team’s latest effort to revive franchise that has not been to postseason since Brett helped win a title in 1985.
lead_paragraph: Kansas City hired George Brett as interim hitting coach in the team’s latest effort to revive a franchise that has not been to the postseason since Brett helped win a title in 1985.

headline.seo: Royals, Looking for Offensive Boost, Turn to George Brett
headline.main: Royals Look Again to Brett for a Lift
headline.print_headline: Royals Look Again to Brett for a Lift
